# Next.js Portfolio Project - GitHub Pages Deployment

## Project Overview
A modern portfolio website built with Next.js, configured for static export to GitHub Pages.

## Tasks
- [x] Create project instructions file
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project
- [ ] Configure for GitHub Pages
- [ ] Create portfolio components
- [ ] Install dependencies and compile
- [ ] Create development task

## Tech Stack
- Next.js (with static export)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- GitHub Pages deployment

## Development Guidelines
- Use App Router architecture
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Configure static export in next.config.js
- Include deployment workflow for GitHub Pages
